name: Types
description: In the wizarding world, spells are categorized into seven different types, each with their own unique properties and effects. This section provides an overview of these spell types and the different spells that fall into each category.$(p)Whether you're interested in transfiguration, charms, jinxes, hexes, curses, counters, or healing spells, this comprehensive guide will give you an understanding of each type of magic and its uses in the wizarding world.
